control.name: Do not load user-supplied local resources into WebViews
control.desc: WebViews can load content remotely and locally from the app data directory. If the content is loaded locally, users should not be able to change the filename or path from which the file is loaded, and they shouldn't be able to edit the loaded file. To avoid this you shall not allow the loading of local resources into the Webviews.

reference.name: OWASP MASVS - Android - Testing for Local File Inclusion in WebViews
OWASP MASVS - iOS - Testing for Local File Inclusion in WebViews

test.steps: Check if you can identify and change the url of local or remote files and if you can access those files.
